description: You don’t even have to put on these pants to know they’re comfortable—just looking at them, you can practically feel it. Even still, though, once they’re on, you might be surprised by what you feel. Made with a super-soft French terry blend that brings the comfort of post-consumer recycled Merino wool, our Women’s Recycled Terry Crop Wide Leg Pant features a relaxed fit for room to move and a drawcord at the waist for adjustability. And the cherry on top is the two drop-in pockets for hand warmth or storage. With all they’ve got to offer, these pants aren’t just comfy. They’re SUPER comfy.
name: Recycled Terry Crop Wide Leg Pants - Womens

specs.value: 62% Recycled Polyester, 29% Recycled Wool, 3% Recycled Nylon, 3% Elastane, 3% Other Fibers. Exclusive of Decoration.
